p.k: Western with John Wayne and Oliver Hardy. In Alabama in 1818, two ex-Kentucky militiamen side with exiled French settlers against a land-grabber
Historical drama. The Oscar-winning Ingrid Bergman stars as an amnesiac refugee who Yul Brynner tries to pass off as the daughter of the murdered
Western starring Randolph Scott and John Carroll. A man seeking revenge on the person who took his wife, who later killed herself, tracks his quarry
Cold War thriller starring Michael Caine as the British spy Harry Palmer, who is sent to help a Communist defector cross over from East Berlin
Dark fairy-tale action-adventure starring Chris Hemsworth, Jessica Chastain, Charlize Theron and Emily Blunt. A story of evil queens and ill-fated lovers. Violence
Violent thriller with Idris Elba, Richard Madden and Charlotte Le Bon. A pickpocket, an anti-fascist and a CIA agent uncover a conspiracy in Paris
Action horror starring Brad Pitt. A retired UN investigator joins an armed research group travelling the globe in search of a cure for a virulent zombie plague. Gory violence
Thriller with Tom Hardy and Noomi Rapace. In 1950s Russia, a demoted security services agent realises that a serial killer is targeting young boys
